content: Why should North Korea care what the UN thinks?? Heck they have watched Iran snub their nose at the UN for years and NOTHING happen except they get sanctions against them. Those sanctions mean absolutely nothing when you need so called 'international support' to act on anything than speaking out against it. But even then, many within the international community ignore the sanctions and continue to support those leaders anyway.. People want to stick their heads in the sand and believe they are bluffing--but I doubt they are. They can call on Iran, Russia, Venezuela and many others to side with them..
